dataList.title: ลงจากรถ
dataList.desc: I found myself looking at dead and dying Sinners in the middle of the Nest, a place that's supposed to be peaceful. And in front of me is... I began tracing back my memories to figure out what happened.

dataList.title: ความสามารถและอัจฉริยะ
dataList.desc: Why are there Abnormalities in the middle of K Corp's Nest? Vergilius seemed to mean it when he said we could return to the bus after we've dealt with this commotion. Passing by frightened crowds, we head to the center of the mess.

dataList.title: โดรนและสิ่งผิดปกติ
dataList.desc: Getting suspicious drones out of the way, we're dealing with the chaos. They look quite expensive at a glance, and the K Corp. logo on them makes me all the more hesitant about destroying them.

dataList.title: โดรนและสิ่งผิดปกติ 2
dataList.desc: Getting suspicious drones out of the way, we're dealing with the chaos. They look quite expensive at a glance, and the K Corp. logo on them makes me all the more hesitant about destroying them.

dataList.title: โดรนและสิ่งผิดปกติ 3
dataList.desc: Getting suspicious drones out of the way, we're dealing with the chaos. They look quite expensive at a glance, and the K Corp. logo on them makes me all the more hesitant about destroying them.

dataList.title: กลับคืน
dataList.desc: We no longer see those annoying drones. Now, it's us between the Abnormalities, the threat we actually should remove.

dataList.title: ลูกค้า
dataList.desc: We managed to defeat the Abnormalities and got back on the bus. Who could be giving us a request? I looked out the window, pretending not to hear Ishmael's faint humming.

dataList.title: สมัครงาน
dataList.desc: We saw someone we never thought we would see again. But, the Sinners didn't seem too thrilled about the reunion. The client, who says his name is 'Dongrang', starts a friendly conversation. This is despite the fact that no one other than the Sinners can hear what I say...

dataList.title: หลอดยาฟื้นฟู
dataList.desc: After boasting about K Corp's regeneration technology, Dongrang invited us to his lab. Disregarding Samjo's visible shock, we followed Dongrang into his workplace.

dataList.title: องค์กรก่อการร้าย
dataList.desc: Intruders broke into the lab. Samjo called them terrorists, but they rejected the notion and instead introduced themselves as the 'technology liberation alliance'. Whatever they are, we have to fight them to survive the attack and proceed with the request.

dataList.title: องค์กรก่อการร้าย 2
dataList.desc: Intruders broke into the lab. Samjo called them terrorists, but they rejected the notion and instead introduced themselves as the 'technology liberation alliance'. Whatever they are, we have to fight them to survive the attack and proceed with the request.

dataList.title: หลอดยาหลอมละลาย
dataList.desc: Intruders broke into the lab. Samjo called them terrorists, but they rejected the notion and instead introduced themselves as the 'technology liberation alliance'. Whatever they are, we have to fight them to survive the attack and proceed with the request.

dataList.title: หลอดยาหลอมละลาย 2
dataList.desc: Intruders broke into the lab. Samjo called them terrorists, but they rejected the notion and instead introduced themselves as the 'technology liberation alliance'. Whatever they are, we have to fight them to survive the attack and proceed with the request.

dataList.title: หลอดยาหลอมละลาย 3
dataList.desc: Intruders broke into the lab. Samjo called them terrorists, but they rejected the notion and instead introduced themselves as the 'technology liberation alliance'. Whatever they are, we have to fight them to survive the attack and proceed with the request.

dataList.title: กลับคืน
dataList.desc: As continued battles against the machines were wearing us out, I heard a confident voice.

dataList.title: ยุคสมัยของมนุษยชาติ
dataList.desc: Accompanying Shrenne and Fixers from Rosespanner Workshop, we headed for the Lobotomy Corp. branch. Feels like a lot of people are involved in this mission. Are we really gonna be safe walking into a place occupied by terrorists?

dataList.title: พันธมิตรปลดแอกเทคโนโลยี
dataList.desc: In the branch facility, we ran into the same machines we saw at K Corp. instead of terrorists. For some reason, these machines are playing a strange voice that calls us worms when we destroy them.

dataList.title: พนักงานดีเด่น
dataList.desc: According to Samjo, one of the technology liberation alliance's members is a former K Corp. laboratory worker. What does that organization build these machines for, and why do they attack and terrorize K Corp's labs?

dataList.title: พนักงานดีเด่น 2
dataList.desc: We met Ran, who apparently used to work for a K Corp. laboratory. Before we could properly talk with her, she vanished forever, leaving mysterious words. And Shrenne looks despondent for whatever reason.

dataList.title: พนักงานดีเด่น 3
dataList.desc: We met Ran, who apparently used to work for a K Corp. laboratory. Before we could properly talk with her, she vanished forever, leaving mysterious words. And Shrenne looks despondent for whatever reason.

dataList.title: ผู้ทรยศ
dataList.desc: Glaring at Shrenne, Outis stops on the way, having made some kind of conclusion. I couldn't begin to guess what it could be, so I decided to stay and listen.

dataList.title: ผู้ทรยศ 2
dataList.desc: Outis and Meursault claimed that there's a traitor in our group. Niko from Rosespanner Workshop denied the accusation, but the suspicion wasn't without reason. The Sinners were now confronting the people they were talking with mere moments ago. This one is an outsider turning against us, but... it made me wonder how long "our" bond could last.

dataList.title: ผู้ทรยศ 3
dataList.desc: It was revealed that Shrenne and Rosespanner Workshop Fixers were in cahoots with the enemy. Before we could ask the reason, one of the Fixers melted down after a forced injection of the regeneration ampule. Wasn't that... supposed to heal the body? For now, we have Niko and the remaining Fixers to deal with.

dataList.title: ผู้ทรยศ 4
dataList.desc: It was revealed that Shrenne and Rosespanner Workshop Fixers were in cahoots with the enemy. Before we could ask the reason, one of the Fixers melted down after a forced injection of the regeneration ampule. Wasn't that... supposed to heal the body? For now, we have Niko and the remaining Fixers to deal with.

dataList.title: ผู้ทรยศ 5
dataList.desc: It was revealed that Shrenne and Rosespanner Workshop Fixers were in cahoots with the enemy. Before we could ask the reason, one of the Fixers melted down after a forced injection of the regeneration ampule. Wasn't that... supposed to heal the body? For now, we have Niko and the remaining Fixers to deal with.

dataList.title: เส้นแดง
dataList.desc: Now that the Rosespanner Workshop Fixers are defeated, it's time to question Shrenne. She stands still and watches the situation unfold without a hint of panic.

dataList.title: พบพาน
dataList.desc: Assassins claimed Shrenne's life. Dongrang didn't appear too shocked by her death even though they had joined the Wing at the same time. He says internal conflict is like a cycle of some kind. How much trust do I have in the Sinners, and how much trust do they have in me? With questions I won't be able to answer, we headed for the place where the Golden Bough resonated.

dataList.title: ช่องว่าง
dataList.desc: Dongbaek's unexpected attack pierced Yi Sang's chest. Winding time would heal the wound, but will it really fill the hole in his heart? I had no way to know what dream Yi Sang could have been dreaming, resting with his eyes closed.

dataList.title: บุกรุก
dataList.desc: Yi Sang came back to his senses as though nothing happened. Meanwhile, Samjo's phone starts ringing incessantly.

dataList.title: กลุ่มดาว
dataList.desc: The K Corp. laboratory was unexpectedly attacked. It seems that the technology liberation alliance has acquired the ability to revert Abnormalities to eggs. We hurried back to the building.

dataList.title: จับกุม
dataList.desc: Hacked by technology liberation alliance members, K Corp's ampule-distributing machines turned against us. We have to defeat K Corp. security forces and make our way through.

dataList.title: จับกุม 2
dataList.desc: Hacked by technology liberation alliance members, K Corp's ampule-distributing machines turned against us. We have to defeat K Corp. security forces and make our way through.

dataList.title: วายร้ายฉลาดเฉลียว
dataList.desc: The liberation alliance member was waiting for us instead of retreating. As if they have a secret weapon prepared...

dataList.title: วายร้ายฉลาดเฉลียว 2
dataList.desc: The liberation alliance member was waiting for us instead of retreating. As if they have a secret weapon prepared...

dataList.title: สายด่วน
dataList.desc: Samjo's phone is ringing like crazy again. Maybe we can try and find useful information we couldn't get from Dongrang and Samjo while they're away...

dataList.title: สายด่วน 2
dataList.desc: While Dongrang and Samjo were away, we sent Meursault to investigate Shrenne's mailbox. Maybe we'll learn more about the technology liberation alliance.

dataList.title: สายด่วน 3
dataList.desc: While Dongrang and Samjo were away, we sent Meursault to investigate Shrenne's mailbox. Maybe we'll learn more about the technology liberation alliance.

dataList.title: อดีตอันรุ่งเรือง
dataList.desc: Meursault has returned. Let's see what information he brought with him.

dataList.title: อดีตอันรุ่งเรือง 2
dataList.desc: Hacked by technology liberation alliance members, K Corp's ampule-distributing machines turned against us. We have to defeat K Corp. security forces and make our way through.

dataList.title: อดีตอันรุ่งเรือง 3
dataList.desc: Hacked by technology liberation alliance members, K Corp's ampule-distributing machines turned against us. We have to defeat K Corp. security forces and make our way through.

dataList.title: คลาส 1
dataList.desc: We see ominous-looking K Corp. staff on the other side. Dongrang and Samjo rejoined our group; it seems the talk went well enough.

dataList.title: คลาส 1 2
dataList.desc: We see ominous-looking K Corp. staff on the other side. Dongrang and Samjo rejoined our group; it seems the talk went well enough.

dataList.title: ยุคสมัยอันไร้ซึ่งด้วยเทคโนโลยีใดๆ
dataList.desc: We met a familiar technology liberation alliance member. That's the one who was with Ran in the last laboratory raid.

dataList.title: ยุคสมัยอันไร้ซึ่งด้วยเทคโนโลยีใดๆ 2
dataList.desc: We defeated Marile. With that, we finally learned that the technology liberation alliance's goal was to return to an era where there was no technology.

dataList.title: ยื่นเสนอเข้าร่วม
dataList.desc: An unhappy Ryōshū calls Yi Sang. We began talking about our reasons for joining the company.

dataList.title: ยื่นเสนอเข้าร่วม 2
dataList.desc: To get to the 'screening room' Dongrang mentioned, we have to defeat the foes on the way.

dataList.title: ห้องฉายจอ
dataList.desc: We made our way to the 'screening room'. It was dark, but we could see something at the center hanging down from above, like it was looking down at us.

dataList.title: ตูม
dataList.desc: Past bonds thought to be severed have met again; Dongbaek showed obsessive determination to reclaim the Singularity.

dataList.title: ไม่มีสิ่งอันใด
dataList.desc: An intense golden glow blinked from the Golden Bough that was stabbed into Dongbaek. Soon enough, the space in the K Corp. building around us begins to twist and morph. What could be happening?

dataList.title: ไม่มีสิ่งอันใด 2
dataList.desc: An intense golden glow blinked from the Golden Bough that was stabbed into Dongbaek. Soon enough, the space in the K Corp. building around us begins to twist and morph. What could be happening?

dataList.title: ยึดติด
dataList.desc: Technology liberation alliance members we were sure were dead start attacking us. We keep moving forward in the rearranging space, looking for the Golden Bough that's still near us.

dataList.title: ยึดติด 2
dataList.desc: Technology liberation alliance members we were sure were dead start attacking us. We keep moving forward in the rearranging space, looking for the Golden Bough that's still near us.

dataList.title: ยึดติด 3
dataList.desc: Technology liberation alliance members we were sure were dead start attacking us. We keep moving forward in the rearranging space, looking for the Golden Bough that's still near us.

dataList.title: ภาพรำลึกสันนิบาตนักประพันธ์ทั้งเก้า
dataList.desc: Technology liberation alliance members we were sure were dead start attacking us. We keep moving forward in the rearranging space, looking for the Golden Bough that's still near us.
